alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 3:23PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Elmore, southwestern Camas and northwestern Gooding Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Anderson Dam, or 21 miles northeast of Mountain Home, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bennett Mountain and Arrowrock Reservoir around 330 PM MDT. Danskin Peak around 340 PM MDT. Tollgate around 350 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
